Key Match Events: Buddy Hield made a solid debut for the Golden State Warriors with 22 points
Steph Curry helped himself to a double-double with 17 points and 10 assists
The Golden State Warriors coasted to an easy win with a 139-104 score
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Golden State Warriors started with Steph Curry and Andrew Wiggins as their backcourt
Portland fielded Anfernee Simons and Deni Avdija as their guards
Others: The Trail Blazers were off to a hot start before the Warriors caught up
Henderson had 22 points off the bench for the Blazers
The lack of floor balance and communication played a key role in Portland's loss
